titleStmt.title: One blow at the feet of the imposing formal Quaker's image: or, Rather an epistle of love and good will to them, to shew them their great weakness (if not folly) in saying thee and thou ... / writ by Nich. Eed ...
titleStmt.author: Eed, Nich.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by J. Gwillim ... and Edw. Swaine ...,

notesStmt.note: "January the 7th. 1692/3. This may be printed, Ed. Bohun."
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
